These cookies are quite good; they are similar to a shortbread cookie.  I will say however, that my toddler son wanted these all the time once he tried them... even in place of his supper!  :-)  We had to explain they were just a treat and not a meal!

This is by far my 3 yr old favourite since we started introducing Earth's Best product to him since he started solid. I didn't do the subscribe, perhaps I would one day to save some money, but we just ordered and received 12 boxes (ordered 2 pack of 6) and we'll see how long it'll last us.
Yummy not too sweet organic cookie! Amazon's price is amazing with subscribe and save! We love them!
My kids love these!!!  They are so yummy and help satisfy my kids' sweet cravings!!

These candies are great if they are NOT expired. I have ordered these candies from several different sellers on multiple occasions and I have consistently received expired products. Additionally, some sellers put company stickers over top of the expiration date so you can't tell when the product expires. Beware of the following sellers as I have had trouble with each of them: Toys Samurai, ABCTOY4me and ToysDiva. I have reported each of them to Amazon (4 different complaints in the past 4 months) and Amazon has done nothing to stop them from sending out expired products or products with hidden expiration dates. Good luck.

I was a bit skeptical at first when I saw the price of these papers, but as soon as I tried it out, the money was well worth it. It really does taste like grape & makes whatever you're smoking kind of smell like grape as well. The papers themselves smell so good! Overall, a very good buy.
Its very smooth and burns slow like it says. I will buy again. I recommend this product to everyone...thats bassically all( Im stalling because I need to write 20 words. well see ya. bye
an awesome rolling paper, it really is slow burning and easy to roll, awesome graphics of grapes on it which was cool and is more flavored than a grape dutch. nice and cheap aswell
They smell really good but they are really small o well and they got here in under a week burn and taste great also

Summary: This has won me over to a little peanut butter.
Text: I didn't like peanut butter At All until I tried this(I love honey though), & wow it was pretty good! I use it also to make some awesome cookies & peanut butter bars. It is a little sweeter than regular peanut butter & doesn't stick to your mouth to much. It is awesome!! I highly recommend it.

I don't normally care for soup mixes, but thought a single serving mix was worth trying, especially for 150 calories per serving. I was pleasantly surprised by the full flavor of these soups. They are a little thin, but still flavorful, and they don't have that 'processed' taste a lot of mixes have. They are high in sodium, but that's nothing new for a soup. Just be careful with the rest of the daily menu so it all balances out. The red chili and the green chili soup mixes are perfect with a cup or two of chopped broccoli thrown in. I tried broccoli in the tortilla soup but it wasn't a good mix. I may try adding chopped squash or some other veggie instead.

My package was leaking powder when it arrived. Several of the packets were not sealed properly and had leaked out. Comida Loca customer service was genuinely concerned and very attentive and sent a replacement. I've also ordered another box from Amazon.

The reviews were good; variety sounded good, but by the time you add the chicken and the tomatoes and the milk, you've paid several dollars for about 1/2 cup of dried potatoes and spices. Was not surprised to see that potato is the primary ingredient.

Yes, as reviewers said, nice blend of spices but unless you add quite a lot of your own ingredients to the pot, there is no substance - just nicely flavored milk/water. Will not buy again.

THIS WAS BEYOND MY EXPECTATIONS.  THE VARIETY WAS A GREAT BLEND OF DIFFERENT SOUPS AND SO EASY TO FIX.  EVEN MY HUSBAND LIKED THEM.  I QUICKLY ORDERED ANOTHER SET, BECAUSE IT WAS SO GOOD.  TASTY AND EASY

The potato soup is wonderful.  THe Green Chili Chicken soup (we add our own chicken leftover from a pre cooked chicken along with a can of chopped tomatoes - it is very tasty.  It is also spicy, so don't add a can of zesty tomatoes unless you can stand the heat...

Summary: Very tasty with the right amount of zing
Text: This soup takes a little bit of time to make - it's not a mix with water and boil soup.  I followed the directions exactly the first time I made it and the second time, I added frozen corn and only used milk (instead of milk and water) for a heartier richer soup.  But the spices are just right!  I really like this product.  It is a quality product!  I live in Europe where I can't get any Mexican food, so this satisfies my cravings for something spicey.  And it's easy to pack or ship.
This soup is really delicious if you add 8oz. of smoked turkey to it during cooking...

Summary: Quick and easy with plenty of flavor
Text: A quick and easy addition to any meal or is a great quick meal in itself. Plenty of flavor with a spiciness that is just right. This is so good, I plan to try Comida's other offerings.

Salt makes this taste good. I hate to say it but this stuff has been sitting on my pantry shelf for months and months. After making my first cup of hot soup (very easy, by the way, just add water and microwave....), I thought it tasted bitter and a bit flat. So, out of desperation, lately, I had nothing for snacking, so I made myself a cup of this soup. I added some soy sauce (don't know why). That made it absolutely delicious - salt was what it needed. Salt has that ability to 'fix' what is lacking. And it certainly fixed this for me. It has a very good taste, once adjusted with just a little bit of salt.

I had Turtle Island tortilla soup before, it was very good but I can't find that in the local markets, that's why I checked into Amazon and looked for it. Instead I came across the comida loca soup mix reviews, people seem really like it, so I ordered some and tried it out myself. I really enjoy the soup, it is very tasty and easy to make. I won't say it tastes better than Turtle Island brand, but it's definitely a lot cheaper. It cost about half the price of the other brand, but it taste just as good as the other brand. I'll definitely buy it again. Thank you for the reviews.

WE HAD ORDERED THE VARIETY PACK OF THE SOUTHWEST SOUPS ALSO FROM THIS COMPANY AND THIS ONE WAS OUR FAVORITE. THEY WERE ALL GREAT, BUT THIS ONE WAS TOPS.  WE ADDED A LITTLE HAM TO IT AND WOW!  GREAT SOUP AND SO EASY TO MAKE.

Actually, I couldn't make a soup this good even if I had all the indregients, and a fully-stocked kitchen.  The flavors are crisp and balanced, not too veggie-heavy nor too sharp, just the right balance and thickness.  And they are almost complete -- you just add milk, or water, and more ingredients if you happen to have them -- bell peppers, for instance -- and you have a full-fledged soup.  The Comida Loca soups are not "open and serve soups" nor are they just stock to which you have to source and prepare all the ingredients -- they are ALMOST complete from the container, and you add a little bit (milk, corn chips, etc) at the end.  So they are a terrific mix of easy but not over-preocessed.  As you can tell, I am a big fan and always have a variety of them on hand -- perfect for a northeast winter's day!

Summary: Soup so good you'd swear it was from scratch --
Text: Actually, I couldn't make a soup this good even if I had all the indregients, and a fully-stocked kitchen.  The flavors are crisp and balanced, not too veggie-heavy nor too sharp, just the right balance and thickness.  And they are almost complete -- you just add milk, or water, and more ingredients if you happen to have them -- bell peppers, for instance -- and you have a full-fledged soup.  The Comida Loca soups are not "open and serve soups" nor are they just stock to which you have to source and prepare all the ingredients -- they are ALMOST complete from the container, and you add a little bit (milk, corn chips, etc) at the end.  So they are a terrific mix of easy but not over-preocessed.  As you can tell, I am a big fan and always have a variety of them on hand -- perfect for a northeast winter's day!

This is one of my favorite quick lunches on a busy day.  I make the soup, cut up a few carrot sticks, warm up a couple of flour tortillas and I've got a quick, nicely spicy, mexican meal.  I also keep a couple in my purse when I'm traveling on airplanes.  The stewardess gets me a cup of boiling water, I pour in the soup, and I've got a much better snack than those $5 meals they sell you on the plane.

Summary: NOT AS GOOD AS FULL SIZED
Text:
I had tried and really liked the full sized version of this

but the "cup of soup" size was just not as good

The soups that I ordered were delicious. Let me begin with that. However, it took me awhile to receive them. The first order I received was only an empty box. Apparently it was damaged during shipping and was torn open. I emailed Amazon and they replaced the shipment immediately with no questions asked. THANK YOU.

The second (same) shipment that I received was also damaged. This time, the outside of the packaging was fine, but the soups were leaking. Of the 32 total soup packets, 8 of them work broken open.

The failing, I believe, is not in the shipping but rather the packaging of these. They need to be shipped in a tight box rather than the large box they were delivered.

I operate a small shop inside an office building, and really would like to continue ordering these soups, however, they are too expensive to lose 25% upon delivery.

Thanks, I look forward to improvements...at least in shipping.

Regards,
John Jean
[...].

This barely qualifies as food. It's a little plastic bag of dried corn, a few little pieces of dried potato and some spice reminiscent of what you'd find in a 10 cent pack of ramen. Add water and you've got yourself spicy corn water. Honestly, who are these other reviewers?

Just awful. I'm throwing the rest out, what a waste of time and money.

The packaging had roaches, don't know if that is the seller's fault. We threw away the packaging and washed the cans. The veggies were crisp but had a slight bitter taste, like the water they were packed in had a touch of vinegar. Probably end up throwing them out.

Summary: I Love this Product I use it in everything!
Text: I love this product.I use it in egg dishes,meatloaf,potato dishes and every time I use it, people exclaim "this is fantastic,what did you put in it" It is on the salty side,so adjust accordingly. The only problem is it's had to find. If you can get your hands on some I suggest you buy several. I made a lasagne with goat cheese and put it in the cheese... heavenly!

Summary: One of the best , so easy to make and oh so tasty
Text:
easy to make just follow the instructions on the box
However, instead of water i use MILK , plus i always add a pinch of salt, freshly grated lemon peel, pure vanilla extract, pure almond extract , cinnamon extra , nutmeg extract .
or sometimes , if i am adding rhum, i would substitute 1/2 of the milk with rhum ..
U do not want to add more liquid because it is " super Moist "...
I received the package in a timely manner. The product was everything it was advertised to be. The walnuts were fresh and packaged nicely.

I make my own coffee flavoring syrup to save money, however the most expensive part is the extract. This is easily one of the best values I've found for bulk almond extract. The seller is reliable and ships very fast and I will most likely purchase more in the future.

Because of my Danish background,I use a lot of almond products.  I am unable to buy my usual store brand in my new little town, so I got online and started to read reviews.  My almond extract arrived and was put into a taste test in our almond brownies that very day.  We took these to a middle school picnic and SEVERAL people asked what that incredible flavor was in the brownies!  The extract is wonderful.  There is no bitterness at all.  The flavor is true, rich and strong.  The cost is so reasonable and it was well padded in the package.  This will be my extract from now on.  Try it, you will LOVE it!

This is exactly what I needed.  I use a lot of almond flavoring, & this bottle-size is great for me.  It is real almond extract and not imitation, which is something that I didn't care about before.  After using this extract, I probably can't use imitation flavoring anymore. This extract gives the perfect Almond taste and that little bite that I like to taste in my recipes.  I will be ordering this as long as it is available.

Read a lot of reviews complaining about the taste and odor of the product. I have to say....  The product we received looked and smelled like Almond extract. My wife used in her poppy seed bread and it was excellent!
I use Almond extract alot aroung the holidays...tired of buying those little bottles for almost $3 each....very happy with purchase.  Great price

Summary: almond extract not in a brown bottle
Text: This product is not what is seems.  I thought it would come in a brown bottle but it came it a plastic clear container.  I would not have purchasedit.  The product is just o.k..

Summary: Wish it is I could know what makes them go!
Text:
My kitties, that is, when I bring out the catnip! All I have to do is make one tiny sound of my roll-down desk board and they come running--from anywhere! How they hear one crack of that unroll and know it is catnip time, I don't know, but fun, fun, fun is about to begin!

Roll, rub, twist, and again, roll, rub, twist. Relax. Push each other off the double scratching pad where I sprinkle the catnip. Two kitties vie for their dose of catnip om, or wherever they go. Munch, munch, then roll again.

I'm such their goddess for bringing on such delight. What little to make so much happiness. Crazy Kitty Catnip! Ahhhhhh.

This is a great value and has a nice, strong aroma.  My cats are very pleased with it, and they tend to be fussy about their nip. (They don't care for weak, stale catnip.)  This compares very favorably in quality to the expensive beautifully packaged organic cat nip I bought some months back.

Summary: Cat can smell if thorugh the packaging
Text: My cat loves catnip, but refuses to touch the cheap dry stuff.  This stuff he could smell through the canister and therefore decided to pick it up and run away with the whole thing! I have since had to hide it in the top of my closet... this stuff is great!
This catnip does the trick.  It's not as good as Doctors Foster & Smith catnip, but much, much better than Crazy Catnip.
My cats look forward to receiving their dose of catnip. It's really fun to watch them roll around in it and know that they enjoy it so much.
They are very attracted to this cat nip.  It's very potent.
My cats love this stuff! I get it out & they come running, sticking their heads in the bowl trying to dump it out! Makes them so happy! Recommend this product highly!

I got this for my friend's cat and the cat loved it!!! Before we even opened the package she was sniffing it like crazy! I recommend this to anyone who has a cat. Hands down best cat nip I have ever bought!

...but the cats seem to love it. And that's the important thing. I sent some off to my favorite tomcat, and (while I wasn't there, I've heard) he was clawing at it even before it was opened. Whatever this says about the container seal, it's a testament to its power.

This Sebastianos syrup is truely great almond tasting, and i like it in my hot tea, with my cold milk and cereal, and on the rocks. It has a nice strong sweet taste so you dont need to use a lot. Try their LIME SYRUP with your lemon-aid, so good. From Amazon of course.

Summary: Delicious - soft with true licorice flavor
Text: I enjoyed this very much. It arrived quickly, and was fresh and not over-packaged. Very nice licorice flavor - like what you would find in a good candy store. Will order again.

Summary: Picture of item is not item received
Text: I ordered these for my mother.  She did receive a teddy bear and flowers in a basket but the Teddy bear was white and super cheesy with a red bow. There were all these orange carnations that clashed with the rest of the flowers and I don't even see carnations in the picture listed. I paid $70 for the flowers with shipping and it was NOT worth it. The teddy bear in the pic looks like it has value, the one my mother received looks like it came from a claw machine. Wish I wouldn't have paid so much money for such a cruddy arrangement.

Contrary to the information on this page, the Country of Origin is NOT Taiwan but Spain.

The ingredients are:
Farm raised mussels, soya oil, vinegar, spices and salt

From the flavor, I believe the 'red pepper' in the 'red pepper sauce' is sweet Spanish paprika.

Regarding origin...the label on the box reads as follows...

Distributed by:
World Finer Foods, Inc.
Bloomfield, NJ 07003 U.S.A.
PRODUCT OF SPAIN

These have a lot of marinade but also plenty of nice, cocktail-sized, firm little mussels. They are slightly tangy and not spicy hot at all. I'm going to try these in some pasta and rice dishes and include the marinade with them.

An excellent price for a quality product on subscribe & save if you love Spanish marinated mussels.

Dawg lemme tell you somthin about this liquor. You pop this bottle and all them ladies be at yo side like heeeeey just make sure you also got crystaAl know what im sayin?? Frequently bought together should be some bad tunes nawwudimean??

I love these americolor airbrush food paints! They give a great true color to whatever you may be painting...I have used it on both my fondant cakes as well as practiced on paper, and each time they came out exactly like I expected they would! I have read many reviews on this brand, seems to be a favorite among many professional cake decorators!

Summary: Not as pretty as in the picture
Text: It arrived on time and manner, although for the picture I got from the person who received it, is not what I was expecting, the flowers were quite different and it looks a lot smaller. The receipient was happy, but I was not since I expected something else.

Summary: Buy it at the local market for 99c!!
Text: Did you guys know that this product is sold at the 99c store?? I hope you are not buying it here, because the price is even higher than the regular grocery store that sell it for around $2.00 each!  This is highway robbery!  The cake is amazing in taste and texture though! :)
Carrot cake is absolutely the best cake out there. Now, I can bake a delicious cake whenever I feel like it. So handy.

Summary: Very good for a box mix
Text:
While not the same as a homemade carrot cake, this mix will make an acceptable substitute. It reminded us of carrot cake and a bit like a spice cake. Mildly spiced with an acceptable taste. The box cake did not taste quite as moist as a homemade carrot cake but it was good.

I frosted the box carrot cake with cream cheese frosting and most everyone enjoyed eating it.

Recommend.

Having lost 120lb with a gastric bypass, I can no longer eat high fat, sugar ladden items.  These little bites (I wouldn't call them cookies, they are more like little confections).  Give me a sweet indulgence without sabotaging my continued efforts at weight loss.  Oddly enough before the gastric bypass, I tried the fat free but sugared ones and disliked them so much that I threw half the tub out.  These however, are well worth the effort to find.  Thirteen little bites for 35 calories and 9 carbs (6 after considering the fiber) and 4 grams of protein.  A wonderful little bite of delight.  The chocolate are just as good.

These cookies are absolutely delicious and SO addictive!!!  I wasn't as disappointed with Amazon's shipping as others were- I'd say 80% of the cookies were in 'mint' condition (sorry about the pun) and only a couple that were broken in half.  They are dated for 11 monthes from now, which is wonderful.  Overall these are an awesome treat and a great buy!

I've had meringues before and have not been that impressed with them. Miss Meringue Vanilla Chocolettes are the perfect twist on the idea. they take a well made basic vanilla meringue and drizzle stripes of chocolate on them. The chocolate stripe adds just the right boost of flavor and as the heat of your mouth melts the chocolate it also adds moisture and txeture to the meringues. These are a great treat and not bad on calories either.

ProfileName: Robot Rock "Daft Punk? No, sweet punk"
Text: thank you for carrying these amazon. you've made my day. they're my favorite cookies of all time! My order arrived today, all 6 cookie containers were in perfect condition, and the contents fresh and crisp.
These cookies are very tasty, 13 cookies are equal to 2 points for the Weight Watchers program.
These are unbelievably good.  They will totally satisfy your sweet tooth for a relatively low amount of calories.  Mint chocolate chip is refreshing and delicious.

I love these cookies. They are great and are a welcome addition to my weight loss efforts (I've lost over 50 lbs in less than a year).  They give my sweet tooth what it is looking for!  I would highly recommend them!

My husband and I love the "regular" (with sugar) Miss Meringues when we do the Weight Watchers diet as the cookies are incredibly cheap in WW "points value" and provide a few tasty sweet bites. These Sugar Free ones, however, taste nothing like the regular ones and are really quite horrible . . . including a gross texture that gums up in your teeth when you bite them (nothing like an actual meringue) + a bad taste. Skip these! (If I could've rated this product 0 stars I would have.) They have no redeeming qualities.
We love the taste of the cookies/meringues and the price was better than at the store but many of the cookies were crushed which made them messy.
This is a very tasty treat. The combination of the mint flavor and chocolate chips make it delectible.Miss Meringue Mint Chocolate Chip Minis, 6.3-Ounce Container (Pack of 6)

Summary: Definitely not like the ones with sugar but great for what they are
Text: Ok, these cookies are definitely not like the meringues with sugar, I agree those taste a million times better. However, when you want to snack and feel like eating a lot, these are great. 1 serving is only 40 calories, 3 grams of fiber and 4 grams of protein. They are very chocolatey. You can eat the entire package for 80 calories and still get some protein and fiber. They do stick to your teeth, that's for sure. So, if you are really trying to limit your calories, these are good. However, if you care less about the calories and rather eat fewer cookies, go for the ones with sugar (they are delicious). I'm trying to eat less sugar and find meringues addictive so I'm happy with these.

Summary: Great nutritional profile, tastes better than the vanilla variety
Text:
These are made with mostly air and egg white and have a fantastic nutritional profile for bodybuilders and people losing weight or maintaining a weight loss. I've lost 160 lbs through diet and exercise and like the reviewer who had surgery, I don't want to eat the amount of sugar found in normal meringues. The fact there's a reasonable amount of protein in there is a bonus.

With the holidays coming up I appreciate having a treat to bring to parties and dinners that I can both share AND eat, while staying within my daily nutritional target. I like to bring them to church for coffee break after the service.

I can find the chocolate ones in a grocery store 40 min from my home, but the vanilla ones nowhere. This price beats the other online offers and you only have to buy 6 containers at a time.

The chocolate meringues taste better by themselves than the vanilla meringues, although neither is to die for.

Paired with TAZO Wild Sweet Orange Herbal Infusion Tea, Caffeine Free, 20-Count Tea Bags (Pack of 6), however, the vanilla meringues are fantastic. I haven't tried the chocolate meringues with citrus tea, but I bet they'd be good too.

Other citrus teas would probably also work. For example, Numi Tea Dry Desert Lime Herbal Tessan, Tea Bags, 18-Count Boxes (Pack of 6) or Bigelow I Love Lemon Herbal Tea, 20-Count Boxes (Pack of 6).

I wish they made other sugar free flavors, such as mint or cinnamon.

Tried these (now unfortunately stuck with 6 containers) because I really liked another brand that was out of stock (Heavenly Desserts), and I found this brand to have very little chocolate flavor and very little sweetness.  If there's a way for you to try them without ordering them in a six-pack like these are sold on Amazon, try to!

Summary: Miss Meringue's choc chip meringue classics
Text: My family and I love Miss Meringues choc chip meringues, but we couldn't find them in our local supermarkets.  I looked on line and found them and now, we are all very happy.

These meringues are very crisp and fresh, with a wonderful little added crunch of the mini chocolate chips that is totally addictive. The thing to be careful of is the weather - if you are eating them in a humid area, you need to double wrap them once they are open, using an additional outer ziploc bag, or they will get kinda chewy.

When sent from Amazon, these do break a bit in transit, but not too badly.

I LOVE these cookies. They are liking eating mint chocolate chip ice cream, but without the calories. 10 calories per cookies, can't beat that! Nice little chocolate chip crunch as well. Those with food sensitivites, beware, the cookies are dyed green using FD&C Yellow No. 5.

However... meringues, being the delicate little buggers that are, probably shouldn't be shipped excessively. My 6 containers had a lot of shards and dust in the bottom, but unlike the one other reviewer mentioning this, I would say that 80% of the cookies were still intact. Still, for a gift, might be better to buy them for a bit more money at your local Sh*pR*te or Wh*le F**ds (who generally carry the larger sized mint meringues.)
Product arrived quickly and good shape (i.e. no broken up meringues)  Delicious low cal treat!
I thoroughly enjoy these Meringues.  They are a light sweet snack and I especially enjoy these chocolate ones.  I just wish they could be shipped year round.

They do a wonderful job of tasting light and fluffy, with a mint and chocolate taste like mint chocolate ice cream.

However my order was more shards and dust then anything. Maybe just an over enthusiastic shipping clerk on my order of course.
These are delicious and light and just 30 calories per Meringue.  I prefer the mint chocolate chip one over the chocolate chip but both are very good!

These are great for people on a low sugar diet. They are very tasty and melt in your mouth. They contain less than five calories apiece, so you can satisfy your sweet tooth without damaging your diet.

The sweeteners do include isomalt, so there is that problem some of us have with gas -- but since they are quite puffy, a true meringue, you wouldn't be tempted to eat the whole package, so I've not had much of a problem with embarrassing gas.

They're free of most artificial ingredients -- isomalt is a natural food -- but do contain Splenda.

All in all a true calorie bargain!

These cookies are perfect for a guiltless snack and they are so tasty.  The price is good also! I was able to give a few away to my friends and have plenty left over.  Warning however, these cookies are so good it is easy to eat half the container at one sitting!

If you are looking for a great tasting,low calorie cookie,this is it.
At 10 calories per cookie,I find this yummy mint cookie a perfect partner to
a cup of coffee.
As always,Amazon delivered the products I ordered quickly to my door.

Let me say first that these aren't a bad snack food. They have the all the sweetness and flavor you're looking for in a meringue cookie. The problem comes in the fact that they don't "finish" well. That is, they tend to leave a gummy residue on the molars, which is easily removed by the tongue but still annoying. It does become an issue if you eat an actual "serving size" as you end up constantly removing that residue.

I won't be ordering again.

We just moved to Nevada from New Jersey, and I used to get these at our local Walgreens. I was going into meringue-withdrawal, when there they were--on Amazon! They are soooo good, melt in your mouth, and totally asddictive! And less money on Amazon!

Summary: Tasty, but gummy at end. Good low cal alternative.
Text: The taste very similar to the original vanilla, which I ordered just a little while ago. The do have that nice crunchy texture to start, but then end up gummy and sticks to your teeth. Not bad if you have a craving for them, but you will want to brush your teeth and floss after eating them and for some people they will hate the clingy fee. It's not really a problem for those who eat them by putting them in their mouth and letting them dissolve, more for those who munch on them.

I loved the regular mini meringues and wanted to try the sugar free ones. They are somewhat different, and remind me of a chocolate-flavored cheese doodle in consistency, although less full of air pockets. not a strong chocolate flavor, but definitely a guilt free treat. They stick in your teeth, so I enjoy eating a handful with a cup of tea.
Generally, I love the Miss Meringue chocolate mini's, however, the quality is not always consiststant.  Often, the center is a bit "gummy", and not crisp like the outside. The taste is always good.
These sugar free meringues are not very good.  They are very grainy.  I much prefer the ones with sugar but those were out of stock.

good the first three cookies you eat, then after that your teeth start to hurt. then after that all you can smell and taste if the egg white smell. trader joes carries similar meringues but those are great. these are DISGUSTING. my 5, 7 and 9 year old nieces wouldn't even touch them! we went through a couple containers but since we got a whole case....we just ended up throwing them away. please save your money.

As a woman who is constantly watching her weight I tried these on a whim...just to be able to have something sweet without a lot of fat, calories, or carbs, and was very pleasantly surprised. Delicious!!!

Summary: Great nutritional profile, tastes good with orange tea
Text:
These are made with mostly air and egg white and have a fantastic nutritional profile for bodybuilders and people losing weight or maintaining a weight loss. I've lost 160 lbs through diet and exercise and like the reviewer who had surgery, I don't want to eat the amount of sugar found in normal meringues. The fact there's a reasonable amount of protein in there is a bonus.

With the holidays coming up I appreciate having a treat to bring to parties and dinners that I can both share AND eat, while staying within my daily nutritional target.

I can find the chocolate ones in a grocery store 40 min from my home, but the vanilla ones nowhere. This price beats the other online offers and you only have to buy 6 containers at a time.

The chocolate meringues taste better by themselves than the vanilla, but paired with TAZO Wild Sweet Orange Herbal Infusion Tea, Caffeine Free, 20-Count Tea Bags (Pack of 6), the vanilla meringues are fantastic. I bet they'd be good with other citrus teas as well.

For example, Numi Tea Dry Desert Lime Herbal Tessan, Tea Bags, 18-Count Boxes (Pack of 6) or Bigelow I Love Lemon Herbal Tea, 20-Count Boxes (Pack of 6).

I wish they made other sugar free flavors, such as mint or cinnamon.

Summary: was not fresh !!! i bought six pack, open the first one and was thnking it was just this one and all the six pack was humis and
Text: i was buying six pack.....i know this product .  usually it is crispy and tasty, this time it was humid. had a taste like old meringues from the first world war!!! not fresh at all!!!
I love regular merengue cookies and I normally don't have a problem with sugar free, but these cookies had a terrible taste and worse texture.  Stick to the non sugar-free.
I love the regular vanilla mini cookies, but these sugar-free are awful.  Taste bad.  Gummy.  What a shame.
Had to toss out 5 1/2 tubs.  Could not stand eating them.  The worst part was how they stuck in my teeth.  Shudder.  Total waste of money.

I first had this syrup at a local coffee shop- their drink of the day was a "Pistachio Latte," which I had never had before. It was so good that it became my "usual." I realized I should try to make the same drink at home to save money- so I just recently bought a bottle. So glad I did!

First of all, Amoretti had the product on my doorstep faster than Amazon Prime delivered packages when I was a member! Secondly the syrup is SO delicious; I've found 2 pumps is just the right amount for 1 latte (so one bottle should make well over 40 drinks!) It also comes with a handy pump- I've purchased other syrup brands before and none of them came with that. Thirdly, I had an inquiry with Amoretti over my order (a mistake on my part) and they went above and beyond to rectify the situation. Excellent customer service- I will definitely be buying from them again. Can't wait to try some of the other flavors!

In the morning when I wake,
It's Coffee Masters that I make,
To the pouches I do pounce,
Each is one plus one-half ounce,
I avoid the surly Quikstop clerk,
make my cup,
then off to work,
coworkers stare,
they seem suspicious,
how can my coffee be
so delicious?
I drink it making happy sounds,
then drain it to the final grounds.

This is a great coffee blend. My husband and I have a cup of coffee every morning. Because of the packaging, the coffee never gets old and you can adjust the amount that you want. This coffee is perfect each time. I'm very particular about the type of coffee I like, and this coffee tastes Great!!

This is very good coffee and a pretty accurate quantity for a 10 cup pot. I sometimes add one measure of fresh-ground Starbucks French or Jeremiah's Fog Buster to lift the strength if I want a stronger brew. A good value too; at under 10-cents a cup purchasing at subscription.
I bought both the French Vanilla and the Hazelnut.  I mix them together for a delicious cup of coffee.  Not bitter, very very good for the price.
This is a great coffee and a great value for your money. I have ordered it numerous times and am always happy with the flavor of the coffee.

Not terrible coffee, but definitely not much of the French Vanilla flavor compared to others I've tried. This coffee also seems to have a bit of a bitter aftertaste. Thought it was worth a shot on sale.

Summary: You get what you pay for :-(
Text: I would definitely pay the additional few dollars for a different brand of coffee... there was very little flavor to this coffee; the aroma was not even inviting. Although if you're trying to get rid of some house guests, this could be a way to send them on their way...
Not the best coffee, not the worst. If you get it on a super saver deal then it has more appeal but overall I think you are best off just paying more
The price was right. Three bags of french vanilla coffee for $12.00 with coupon. The coffee was great not over powering. Would buy again.
This flavor has a cigar taste to it.  Needless to say, it's not my favorite blend by this company.

I like flavor coffees and anything vanilla is my favorite. Sometimes I will take this and mix it with another flavor like hazelnut or just the french vanilla and add maybe a fourth teaspoon of ground cinnamon or do all three.
The product was past it's expiration date when I received it...almost 3 months past. It smelled good, but was dried out a bit. I will not purchase from this seller again!

I eat gluten free and always carry this bar in my purse and take them along when I travel. It provides adequate protein, good fat, and the lowest sugar (mostly dates) content of any of the "protein" type food bars I've looked at. Tastes good too. I use part of it for a snack if needed and sometimes whole bar for main part of a meal if I can't eat what is available.
These may be the best candy.  Ever.  Delicious and couldn't eat them fast enough!  Can't find these in stores near me, so it was great to find them on amazon and worth the wait!

This is the only Dal Makhani mix that I will use.  The results are EXCELLENT.  I have tried different brands of Indian spice mixes available at my local Indian grocer - and MDH is consistently my favorite.

Summary: My god, this stuff is good
Text: I've tried making Indian food for years, grinding spices, closely following the directions in high end Indian cookbooks.  They just never worked.  The spices were too subtle, too refined.  The thing I love about Indian food is how it practically assaults your mouth (but in a good way).  While whinging about my failures to an Indian friend of mine, she suggested I use the seasonings that regular old Indian people actually used.  She brought me a bunch of MDH spice mixes.  My cooking world changed.  MDH spice blends are dirt cheap and absolutely delicious.  I have a few favorites, and at the top of the list is their Dal Mahkani, which, oh my god, it's amazing.  Buy it, buy it, buy it.  You will not believe how good this stuff is.  And if you go for the down and dirty, smack you in the face awesomeness that only Indian god can give you, grab a box of Chunky Chat while you're at it.  It will rock your world.
Excellent masala.  I love using it with V8 and hot peppers to make great dal!

The manufacturer, Faerie's Finest, has confirmed with me, that there are "TRACE ELEMENTS" in this product that may cause an allergic reaction.  I have been using this product for some time now and really like it and I wanted to make a peanut butter flavored cake for a friend who has allergies to peanuts, so I called the manufacturer as to what the actual ingredients are.  I waited almost 2 weeks for an answer.  I finally had to call them back and had to wait for the owner to reply later in the day.  The person answering the phone read me the ingredients stating there were natural ingredients but this is NOT WHAT THE LABEL STATES. The label says ARTIFICIAL flavors. But she "assured" me it "should be fine"!!  I waited to hear from the owner/manufacturer.  When I got the call back I was informed that the ingredients were naturally derived and contained trace elements that may cause an allergic reaction!  I am SO GLAD I CALLED!  The labeling is not accurate and poses a severe health risk to those with peanut allergies.  The product should be discontinued/recalled until proper labeling can be established.  Otherwise - if you have no allergy to nuts it is a good extract.
These chips are very tasty. Our whole family loves them. A very high end experience for snacking. I highly recommend this product....

The cookies & cream flavor is phenomenal. I've tried the chocolate ice cream flavor and I'm not very fond of it. This is by far better tasting. I'll probably try the banana cream and vanilla flavors next, however this flavor will be hard to beat. What else can be said? It tastes great, not too sweet and it fills you up enough that you're not hungry for hours.

I am very overweight and am in the midst of a major weight loss program. After I lost my first 30 pounds, my blood tests indicated less than normal creatinine levels. This may have been an indicator that I was losing muscle mass along with the fat. My nutritionist recommended a protein supplement, along with regular exercise if I wanted to keep my muscles healthy. The 40 grams of protein in this drink is a major kick for muscle health and at only 260 calories, I can have two per day, and reduce my other meal portions to balance the total calories. This drink has relatively low fat too, which is all the better.

Summary: Mmmm, Labrada Lean Body Cookies & Cream!
Text: I first tried Vanilla Ice Cream and Chocolate Ice Cream flavors of Lean Body by Labrada, which are both really good, the Vanilla being my favorite.  Then I noticed they had Cookies & Cream flavor to offer, so tried it and Cookies & Cream Labrada Lean Body RTD protein drink is now my new favorite!
The taste is amazing. The amount you get is amazing. Finished all of them and i felt so great after my workouts. Also noticed gains when i finished all of them. Love to order again.

All I can say is that this product is outstanding.  It's a great tasting source of high quality protein.  My daughter loves it so much that she requests it above eating any kind of junk food.  BTW - she is extremely skinny (4'8" 48 lbs) and could use the extra quality calories to supplement her diet.  I buy it for myself as a weight loss meal replacement.  It is extremely successful in this manner or to be used as a diet supplement to add lean muscle.

Summary: Too sweet - can't choke down a whole package
Text:
I like the protein and nutrition mix in these. It's appropriate for low-carb diets. But after getting a case four months ago, the last two are still in my refrigerator, and I just can't bring myself to choke them down. They're just too cloyingly sweet for my taste. It's possible that my low carb regimen has made me just too sensitive to sweet taste, but I still use Adkins shakes and don't cringe when I go to consume one.

Also, the Adkins shakes are about the same cost per ounce, but are smaller. These are pretty big (17 oz), so you better be ready for a big shake. Even when I started, I routinely threw away the last two or three ounces, so that's another mark against them compared to Adkins, which have a portion size more in my range.

I think these work better for someone who's more on a body building regimen than a weight loss one. I do some of both, but my primarly focus has been on high protein, low carb for weight management. These didn't do the trick for me in that area. They're not terrible, but I won't get getting any more.

The product is good for on the go cold or room temp but I'm amazed how much sodium is in there! 600mg!  The taste is decent (although I can taste all the sodium) and it has texture to feel satisfied.  Too many addititives for me.  Good for once in a while but not everyday.  I will consider my options.

Summary: Still trying to decide if I like the flavor
Text:
I'll give these 4* for now, because I love everything except the flavor. The protein in these shakes is very high quality. It's a mix of 7 different components and the predominant one is whey. Perfect for drinking after a workout. Amazingly, they have no sugar and are pretty low in fat.

For the Cookies & Cream, I'm still on the fence about the flavor. I love the Vanilla and I've been drinking 4-5 of them per week for years. The Cookies & Cream tastes as advertised when it goes down. But the aftertaste has a kind of bite to it that's hard to describe. I suspect I'll get used to it and keep ordering this flavor for variety. But it won't replace my staple Vanilla.

This is the best protein shake I've every had. It tastes awesome but the after taste isn't that great. Its nothing that will make you want to cry uncle like other shakes but you'll still notice it. It is very filling and has a lot protein in it.

Summary: The price is great and they taste even better
Text:
All these lean body have a common flavor in them, i have had there ice cream chocolate, banana, and this one the cookies and cream.

But thats not a bad thing, they all taste great and they have enough protein.

I love how it has both whey and casein protein because i take these right after a woke out so the whey is very usefull and the caisne is for the rest of the day

great buy, and with the subscription price its very good

I had seen these brownies on GMA and they supposedly were voted "America's best brownie".  I had been so excited to try a very famous brownie from a company in Chelsea Market when we were in NY a couple years ago and was horribly disappointed so I was a bit gun shy to try another media hyped brownie, but curiosity got the better of me.  These are indeed very delicious...moist and full of flavor.  I've only tasted the chocolate chunk, but the box came with caramel pecan and peanut butter as well.  I gave these 5 stars based on the chocolate chunk.  However, since they all have the same chocolate base I expect the other two will be just as yummy.  No disappointment here - - these are terrific!
This is great tea. I am thankful to have found it on-line as our local tea shop source closed after Christmas.

Summary: Most Delicious Apple Chips Made by Seneca
Text: 16 dollar for a 12 pack of these chips is a steal =D!!!! These chips are freaking delicious if you want something sweet to snack on.

I absolutely LOVE these apple chips. My order of 12 (2.5 oz bags) came on Wednesday and they were gone by the following Saturday. I actually just placed another order today as well. I can't get enough! I'm not even a big fan of apples but there is just something so delicious about these apple chips. I've tried most of the flavors and the original and cinnamon are the best. I suggest everyone try these, but know you will probably be addicted after the first bag. Yum!

These apple chips have good flavor, they're just a little bit sweet, and they have a bit of a crunch.  That being said, I was a bit turned off by the product quality.  Every bag has had stem and seed fragments, and well, the apple peel is a little overwhelming.  I don't think I'll have a problem using all 12 bags up.  In fact, I have eaten a few bags in one sitting without realizing it (not great since 2.5 servings per bag) but I am not sure this will be a regular item in my pantry.  If you feel like a fried apple makes a better (i.e. healthier) snack than a fried potato, then this product is probably worth trying, but I personally prefer freeze-dried apples to these fried apples.

These are by far the best chips ever. They satisfy a sweet tooth without being overloaded with calories or fat. The hard part is not eating the whole bag at one sitting. I love these as a mid-afternoon  snack and buying them in the 12-pack is so much cheaper. If you like a light cinnamon flavor, these are for you!
I am in love with this product,  tastes great , I take them with me everywhere,  the price was much cheaper than in the stores!
my family loves these apple chips. We always take them camping and any kind of weekend trip. Very tasty treat and does a good job at satisfying the munchies.
This chips weren't as crispy as I'd hoped.  The package and box indicate they are 'crispy', but they seemed a bit stale.
you can get the apple chips any where for like two dollars a bag 64 dollars for 12 thats a little much man I sure love apple chips but it's so not worth it !

These are for people that cannot tolerate sugar. They are not low cal, just slightly lower cal. The regular Coffee Rio Original Coffee Caramels made with sugar average 15 calories per piece or 60 calories per 17.3 grams, which is 4 pieces. The sugar free version averages 12.5 calories per piece or 50 calories per 16.5 grams, which about 4 pieces. Thatt's 20% fewer calories per piece.

They are slightly softer as the regular Rios and much less sweet and much less flavorful. In terms of flovaor, there is no comparison -- the regular are rich; the sugarfree are bland, emphasis on the "bla". Eating these is a big sacrifice for 20% fewer calories. If you want to reduce caloric intake, the if you can work up the discipline to skip one piece for every 4 you eat, you total enjoyment might be much greater with the 20% fewer calories.

They are made with real coffee and milk and Splenda sweetener, and other things.

If you have partial fillings or crowns or braces, etc. you will want to avoid chewing these even though the are sotftler than the sugared version.

For more general review on the Rio coffee candy, se my review of Coffee Rio Original Coffee Caramels.

Summary: Sugar free and it tastes good
Text:
Coffee Rio Sugar Free candy

I work the graveyard shift and sometimes I need a some extra caffeine to get me through the night. Instead of getting a soda, I chew on the sugar free coffee chews. It give me a little boost but doesn't make me jittery. No strange after taste either.

Summary: A home run - even our cats love it
Text: We started buying Beneful tubs about a month or so ago and, as expected, our dogs just love them. The amazing part came when the cats started jumping up on the counter to get a head start on the dogs' food as we'd prepare it. I might add that these are cats so fussy they won't eat half of the varieties Fancy Feast offers. Now we get extra tubs of Beneful so we have enough to supplement the cats' dry food as well as for the dogs.

Summary: sUPER FAST SHIPPING AND A REALLY GREAT PRODUCT
Text: OUR DOGS LOVE BENEFUL AND NOW WITH THE PREPARED MEALS WE MIX WITH THE DRY AND BOY DOES IT GO FAST !
These cost half what you're charging in the supermarket. Are you just ripping off people who can't do their own shopping?

Summary: WOULD NOT PURCHASE AGAIN HYDROGINATED OILS
Text: THIS IS A DANGEROUS PRODUCT TO PURCHASE IT HAS HYDROGINATED STARCH OR OILS AND IS VERY UNHEALTHY FOR THE BODY TO CONSUME.  IT IS NOT FIT FOR HUMAN CONSUMPTION DUE TO THE HYDROGINATED OILS.  I WOULD NOT PURCHASE THIS AGAIN GOLITELY MUST CHANGE THEIR FORMULA IF CONSUMERS ARE TO PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT.
Good candy for someone with a sweet tooth that has to watch how much sugar he consumes.  My husband loves this product.

i highly recommend this hard  candy-so far i have tried 5 favors and love them all--well worth the price for great taste-i have 4th stage cancer and they suggest to stay away from sugar so about 5 pieces of candy is my treat all through the day-worry free-sugar free

I've developed a love of anything with pumpkin spice in it over the past couple of years, so when I saw this tea I had to try it. First of all, I'm a fan of Bigelow teas. They're always full of flavor and the individual foil packages keep the tea fresh for a very long time. This tea has become one of my favorites. It has a great pumpkin spice flavor and I found it's the best with a little milk and sugar. It's good without adding anything, but adding milk and sugar (or whatever sweetener you may use) makes it taste almost like pumpkin pie.

Many pumpkin-flavored beverages out there fall flat when it comes to the pumpkin spice flavor, but this tea nailed it. I'm glad it comes in a pack of 6 boxes because I'm sure it's going to be hard to find once winter is over.

Summary: Delicious iced tea, only availble locally in season.
Text:
This pumpkin spice tea makes a great pitcher of Iced Tea, with a bit of Truvia or Splenda to sweeten it. The only down side is I couldn't find it after the fall in my area, but now that I found amazon has it, I've got it on a subscription so I'll be sure to have plenty!

Oh, and if you will only use a given flavor occasionally, Bigelow is the way to go, since each Tea Bag is individually foil wrapped to keep it fresh.

I just bought a box of this tea last week to  keep at work and it was gone within 2 days.  It is so delicious and the smell is unbelievable, I had it this morning with almond milk and it was just fantastic.  I have to say Bigelow  makes great  teas, I have been a faithful Bigelow Earl Grey drinker for years.  The individually sealed packs make all the difference.

So here's my OMG Tom and Jerry:  4 cups brewed Bigelow Pumpkin Spice Tea; 1 cup fat free half and half; 3oz. Rum. You'll need to hide this if you want some for yourself. (Tis the season to be a little greedy).
This is my favorite pumpkin tea!  The flavors are perfectly balanced!  Great with a little honey.
I love this one and it really does smell like pumpkin pie.  I love to drink this one from early fall through early spring, it really hits the spot during the cooler weather.
I love this tea. I tried it a couple of years ago, but I  can find it locally only in the fall. I was thrilled when I found it on Amazon's subscribe and save program. Thank you Amazon!

Summary: Great stuff, but a bit too much licorice
Text:
great product, but the hint of licorice isnt very "traditional" with pumpkin and may turn off a few traditionalists.
But I thouroughly enjoyed this tea.

I was a little concerned when I first opened the tea packet, because the aroma reminded me a little of bubble gum.  I was pleasantly surprised to find that the taste is actually pretty well balanced, if not a little sweet.  The cinnamon component is borderline artifical, but I do not consider it off-putting.  I sweetened it with a little maple syrup (100% real syrup, that is), and found it quite drinkable this way.  I'd be intetested to see what it is like with a drop of milk, but it really doesn't need it.

Usually the only outstanding teas are the ones produced in England.  But Bigelow's Pumpkin Spice is the exception---easily the best of the American-made teas---a strong and very pleasant flavor.  I can't understand why it's not sold in more supermarkets, but I'm glad Amazon makes it available.

I love pumpkin and pumpkin spice products, so I was very excited to order this tea when I saw it available on Amazon.  Unfortunately, it has fallen very short of my expectations.  I cannot detect any pumpkin flavor.  It simply tastes like a basic chai.  I don't dislike chai, but that's not what I thought I was buying based on all the glowing reviews here.  I cannot recommend this product.

I won't be finishing this.  I'm not sure if it's the quality of the tea itself or the quality of the spices added to it.  I tried 4 bags and ended up with a lousy cup of tea with a hint of spice and a bad aftertaste every time.  I was expecting pumpkin pie spice.  Maybe cinnamon?  Nutmeg? A little cloves? Ginger?  I, nor any of the people I shared this with detected any of that, one said it tasted like a rotten pumpkin before even seeing the bag or the box, does that count?  I'm no tea snob, this just absolutely didn't do it for any of us, straight or sweetened.  I figured this was a sure bet, and foolishly ordered this 6 pack.  Don't make that mistake, try one box first!

If you need to have the taste of Autumn/Fall in a cup/mug this tea is for you!! I like it plain, just a little milk or with French Vanilla Creamer.  Bigelow Flavored Teas are some of my faves!! Will be ordering the Eggnog'n next!! Thanks Amazon for carrying this brand!!  :)

Summary: Not bad, but there is better out there
Text:
Bigelow Pumpkin Spice (Autumn tea)

Caff-O-Meter: 30-60mg according to box
Ingredients- Black Tea, natural pumpkin flavors with other natural flavors (soy lecithin), cinnamon, licorice root, clove, ginger, pumpkin flakes

**Very important on the first steep you do not go over 4 minutes, it produces a very bitter cup

-Smell: In packet(2)/ Steeping (2) Has a scent somewhat reminiscent of pumpkin but falls rather flat something else overwhelms the pumpkin I may be off but I think it's the clove (scent intensifies when over ice)
-Taste
+Unsweetened : Hot (1)/Cold (2) Flavor of tea is rather bland, I detect very little pumpkin flavor,
+Sweetened: Hot(3)/Cold (3)-Flavor and body of tea really improves with the sweetener. Taste is still a little bland, but there is something very slightly bitter to it (perhaps the licorice, I do not like licorice root).
*I prefer my teas Iced and 1 cup to .5 packet of sweetener. So unless it wows me, without sweetener will always be lower in points so to compensate I add .5 points to the unsweetened taste average.

-2nd steep (3.5) - On the second steep the flavors and scents finally come through and produce a more respectable cup however still on the weaker side for me. It should be noted the 2nd steep will stand up to a longer steeping time. Tried a 3rd steep and it was too weak.

Summary- I paid more for this than on Amazon by ordering a holiday tea collection direct from Bigelow (the single box on here was to much and I wanted variety. I love Halloween and as such pumpkin things tend to suck me in, for the price it is on here I would not discourage purchase however just know there is better out there. If you are looking for something to get you in the mood for fall, this will do. I will happily finish the box, but unless it is clearance at a store I do not plan to purchase more.

If you must have some pumpkin tea now, here is a decent method to get you by (don't expect a miracle of flavor). Pumpkin pie spice (I prefer 1 tsp) "steep" it for 5 minutes hot water then add your preferred tea for a normal steep time. Strain/Sweeten to preference. I use plain lipton loose leaf for now but I can't wait to try this with plain rooibos when I get it.

Feel free to check out my other tea reviews this is only my 2nd so far.

Summary: A pleasant licorice-based tea, not only for fall
Text:
This tea is excellent for licorice tea lovers, since that is its base. The licorice gives a natural bit of sweetness without any sugar, and is delightful. Cardiac patients or those with high blood pressure, be warned that this tea might raise BP and is possibly not for you. Ask your physician before drinking this, OK?

Anyway, the pumpkin flavor is noticeable and the spices complement it well. Some others have compared this tea to chai tea (more accurately called "masala chai") but this doesn't taste enough like chai to make such a comparison, for me.

Licorice fans, pumpkin fans, spice tea fans - go for it. You probably won't be disappointed.

Summary: One of my favorite teas of all time
Text: In the last few years I've developed a love for pumpkin.  This tea is absolutely delicious.  Not bitter like some teas but full of flavor.  My favorite is to make my own rendition of a pumpkin tea latte.  Heat the tea and water in the microwave and let the tea steep for several minutes for full flavor.  It's optional, but when I brew, I like to add just a touch of chai tea flavoring (I use the Torani syrup).  Once ready, I add a sweetener packet and top it off with a little milk.  It's a skinny version of what would be an expensive and fattening tea latte from a coffee shop.  A morning treat.  I offered my sister some of my pumpkin tea, and now she drinks it every morning, too.

I don't drink caffine, and I don't generally favor Bigalow. I was introduced to this tea at a Christmas Tree Stand. It is my alltime favorite tea. Something about the smokey background flavor. Not too spicy or strong ( I like strong, but not too strong). Just really good! It is now usually my first cup in the morning. I can't find it anywhere but Amazon.

I LOVE this tea.  I actually drink it without sugar!  It is not super sweet, but the flavor is such that if you want to be healthier, or don't need the added calories, that it is great without anything added!!  A great contemplative tea and winter companion that you don't want to be without!! :)  PS I did a taste test with all of the other pumpkin teas on the market as a comparison and REALLY did not care for them. I ended up throwing them out because I could not bring myself to drink them! :p
Bought two cases and already went through one of them. It also appears cheaper hear than on the company website.
I have tried other spiced teas buy I keep going back to this one. The spices are wonderful, they are strong but don't leave an aftertaste in your mouth. I enjoy it both hot and as an ice tea.

I'm enjoying this Autumn Spice tea blend--it's different, has a wonderful aroma, and a great flavor to sip on a chilly day or night. It was a better price (for multiple boxes) on Amazon, than it was from Bigelow. Not available in any stores around me, for some reason. I do wish they had a decaffeinated version, though.
This tea is great warm with a little bit of whipped cream on top, taste like pumkin pie in a cup. Made it for my parents when they visited and they loved it as well.
This tea has the real flavor of pumpkin.  It is nicely spiced and perfect for an autumn afternoon.  It is quite highly caffeinated so I do not drink it late at night.  But overall, a lovely tea.

This is a great drink for these cold fall months. It doesn't have as much of a pumpkin taste as I would like. It is more just a spicey flavor. If you want a really big pumpkin burst, this is not what you are looking for.
A friend shared some of this tea with me in the Fall but after Christmas couldn't find it in stores anymore. Great to find it here! Love the taste of it.

Bigelow is know for their quality teas. this one is no exception.
spicy, festive and holiday-evoking in both taste and aroma. it is also a gluten free product for those of use who are celiac. well done!
This is probably one of my favorite teas.  It has a subtle flavor that is neither sweet nor bitter.

I had this tea on a trip I took, and HAD to find it. Surprisingly, no stores in my area carried it, but of course, Amazon had it!! Tastes delicious, doesn't even need sugar. Great product - it's the only tea I drink now!

I've been drinking this tea, seasonally, for awhile now and it is my absolute favorite, either sweetened or non-sweetened, with milk or without. What makes this tea stand out from others is that it is actually pumpkin flavored. I tried the Stash Pumpkin Spice tea when my local store ran out of the Bigelow and it was basically cinnamon tea, not at all what I was looking for. If you want cinnamon tea there are lots of teas out there that will give you that flavor. For those like me, who
detest cinnamon, this one is perfect. Delicious!
Was at a restaurant in Wisconsin and they served this tea.  I was certain I could find it in the store when I got home.  No such luck.  Then I searched Amazon and there it was!  Love this tea!

This is a great tea for when there's a chill in the air.  The best of the pumpkin spice teas... I've tried them all.  I was so excited to find this on Amazon as it is somewhat of a treasure hunt looking for it in stores.  Not readily available in our area.  You won't be disappointed with this tea!

Summary: Pleasantly surprised by a unique tea!
Text: I bought this tea (as well as the apple cider variety) as favor gifts for an autumn tea party bridal shower. I wasn't sure if I would like it myself as I can never seem to get home brewed chai tea to taste like coffee/tea house chai. I was pleasantly surprised to find that this tea can stand alone without the milk, and although it is similar to chai, it has it's own unique flavor. I have tried it both with and without milk and enjoyed it thoroughly each time. Although this won't replace my favorite black teas, I found it a very welcome addition to my cabinet as a flavorful treat.

I was hoping this would have a smell/flavor with a hint of the spices used in pumpkin pie. Unfortunately the flavor and smell is nothing like that. It was worth a try but 120 packets of this will last me forever. I much prefer the vanilla chai and cinnimon flavors by Bigalow.

My girlfriend loves this tea and it's hard to find in the stores, especially when it's not the Thanksgiving/Christmas season, so I was thrilled that Amazon had it.  The girlfriend loves it and was very happy to have six boxes.  If you're worried about the over quantity, it lasts for a year and a half, so you're good to go.
I just love the Pumpkin spice tea! I hope that you keep making them for the holiday season! They are a nice winter drink.
I love this tea! It is so good and even better paired with pumpkin creamer!

This tea has a nice mellow taste.  I like it sweet with cream and boy is it good on a cold Winter or Fall day.  You can only buy it where I live in the Fall or Winter so I was happy to find it here at Amazon, so I can drink it all year long.  When brewing it makes the whole room smell nice.  I drink it at school and my Kindergarteners love the smell and try to talk me into giving them sips, but of course I don't (and I do keep it safely out of their reach).

I can only find this flavor of tea in specialty stores from October through March, and only when they have it in stock.  I think other people like the flavor too.  When I found out that Amazon carried Pumpkin Spice tea, I ordered all six boxes.  When I am on my last box, I will reorder.  Thank you Amazon for carrying my favorite tea.
I was a little disappointed with the tea.  The taste of the pumpkin spice that I enjoy so much in Starbucks Pumpkin Spice lattes was sadly not the same.

Usually, this tea is only available in stores during October and November. But I like it all year long. It's got a rich, spicy taste and tastes like pumpkin pie when you add a milk product and a sweetener.

I'm also glad that the order is for six boxes, so I don't have to ration myself.

I bought a box of this at the grocery store a few weeks ago and was very pleased with the flavors.  There are pumpkin flakes as well as cinnamon, clove, and ginger, so you really get a pumpkin pie flavor with it.  Add a little cream, and it's even more like pumpkin pie.  I liked it so much, I bought a case of 6 from Amazon so when the stores stop selling their holiday tea flavors, I'll still have some.

Bigelow is apparently in the scented water business. And people who can't tell the difference between an aroma and a flavor are giving this high marks.

It has a nice scent.
It has no flavor whatsover.

Be warned... after you buy a huge box of this A mazon won't take it back.

I ordered a single box of this tea and received it today. The aroma of the tea is fantastic. It is very similar to pumpkin pie which reminds me of Thanksgiving and Autumn in general. However the flavor of the tea is too weak. I can barely taste the spices or any pumpkin flavoring. Note: I drink all my tea without cream, milk or sweetners.

I will finish the box I ordered, but I doubt I will order any more.

This tea reminds me more of gingerbread than pumpkin pie -- as others have noted, this is pretty much just a chai variant with the spices you'd put in in pumpkin pie.  Nonetheless, it's quite tasty and I'll buy it again.  I've also tried the Stash pumpkin flavor, which is quite similar to this.  However, I think the Bigelow wins -- the Stash always seems a bit weak to me no matter how long I brew it, perhaps because it's a decaf.

Background - I typically drink Celestial Seasonings tea.  My absolute favorite is the blend "Nutcracker Sweet" which is a black tea, but usually drink some variety of their green or white tea.  I love pumkin pie and was very excited when I saw this blend!  Bought two boxes of this tea and have tried it both hot and over ice... I think the flavors and smell are too overwhelmingly strong.  Perhaps sugar and/or milk would make it more pleasing to your palette, but I just plan to offload the rest my boxes!

Summary: Delicious but not what I expected
Text: This is really delicious, and I suspect it would be great in baking. I am giving it 3 stars only because the description made it sound like it would be more like traditional hot chocolate. Well, it's more like your traditional cocoa powder.

Most delicious cookie to have with tea EVER. And their light making it less guilty to snack.

I had these when I was in London, just glad their is a place a can get them in the states!

This is the best airbrush shimmer I've ever used.  It's a very nice, subtle shimmer that you can build on depending on how shiney you want it.  It's very smooth, and has never clogged my airbrush like AmeriMist does.  Adds an absolutely georgeous sheen, and works equally well on fondant and buttercream.

I love these little mints made in France.  They have a core anis seed with a hard candy covering.  I like all the flavors - violet, orange, lemon, mint, rose and blackcurrant. They are hard to find and I am grateful to be able to find them on Amazon.

Summary: Best Tea on Earth (No, I don't own company stock!)
Text: Everyone in my house is addicted to this tea. We drink it iced. Make one or two pitchers of it a day. It's not sweetened, but has a subtle, natural sweetness to it. Feels refreshing and clean. It was also one of the few things I tolerated well when I was pregnant and routinely nauseated. I've heard this from other mothers too. Love it.

I was introduced to this tea at a local restaurant and went absolutely crazy about it. Its unique flavor and healthifying blend of green and black teas and yerba mate, along with a light touch of ginger, is a wonderful thirst quencher.  As a tonic for health and energy, I now find myself drinking it daily instead of my usual afternoon coffee. It perks up the body and brain without the jittery effects of caffeine. I find I get a delightful pick-me-up later in the day--when I need it--without the negative affects of keeping me up at night.  While a tad expensive, I will continue to buy SPORtea and enjoy its delicious brew.  It is now a part of my every day routine.

This is a great vegetable stock. Sometimes I enjoy a spoonful right out of the tub! It has a rich yet balanced flavor without the artificial sweetness found in may canned and boxed stocks. It is a 20 times reduction of a classic vegetable stock made from carrot, onion and celery stocks, wine, tomato paste, lemon juice, garlic and onion powders and seasonings.

Although I am a devout carnivore I have often cooked for vegetarians. In doing so I have found that this stock reduction will replace a meat based glace or demi-glace in a sauce, (however, they also make a Roasted Vegetable demi-glace which contains a food starch which will thicken a sauce better than this one and has a stronger flavor) and it can be used as a base for soups and stews. I often add a little of More Than Gourmet's Mushroom Stock for a more complex taste. I use this so often that I buy it in the 16 oz. tubs. They keep well in the fridge once opened. A great product to have on hand.

More Than Gourmet Veggie-glace Gold® Roasted Vegetable Demi-glace, 16-Ounce Units (Pack of 2)

More Than Gourmet Essence De Champignon Gold® Mushroom Essence, 1.5-Ounce Units (Pack of 6)

DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!  There are no seals around or under the lids.  The lids on both paprikas and on fennel (also this brand) came loose during shipment spilling the contents.  I do not feel safe using these products but they cannot be returned.  I'm waiting to hear from Amazon on whether or not I can at least get a refund.

This a quality product. No fillers or weird ingredients, which is really important to me since I have a lot of food allergies. I keep a pack in my handbag for when ever I'm out and about and need a snack. I Will definitely order these again, my whole family loves them.
These do have dairy, but are some of the best GF chips I have ever had.  A bit on the pricey side, but for a flavored chip really good!  Highly suggest you get a bag or a dozen!

Summary: Better than any chips I've ever tasted!
Text: Wow, I was hungry and grabbed these on the run. Just had to ask my hubby to confiscate them before I chewed down the who bag. The CEO and company motto made me like them even more! I'm never eating Doritos again! Can't wait to try other late July products!!

These are probably the best chips I have ever had! They are multigrain, organic, gluten free, and with a lot of flavor. Only 5 grams of fat per serving. The seasonings don't over power the grains, it's a good balance of both. I got these at Whole Foods on sale. I am going back for more! When not on sale, they cost the same as the ones from this seller. I have IBS and they don't upset my tummy at all.

Summary: Lots of flavor and a seemingly innocent ingredient list.
Text:
These chips pack a lot of flavor. It's just not a flavor I'm entirely crazy about. They have a bit of a sour taste for me--not rancid sour, more like sour creamish. I like sour cream but this is a little more concentrated than that. I have to say though they definetly satisfied a craving. I feel better about eating these than Doritos which I stopped eating years ago and dearly miss. The bag is pretty small though. It's like two man servings or like 5 girly servings (if you actually restrain yourself to the serving size).

I also tried the Green Chile kind and liked those better. Those were almost a little addicting. I didn't notice anything harmful in the ingredient list (such as MSG) but if you do please let me know.

Far better than the aggressively mundane flavor of the Peanut Butter and Banana `monkey bar', these Strawberry Vanilla bars at least have a pleasant and refreshing flavor.  The lightness of the flavor is delicate but I will admit that it isn't anything special.  I am still left a little iffy on these bars.  The frosted coating on the underbelly is nice and sweet, and the nuttiness of the bar itself has more depth than a standard health bar, that can come off tasting like cardboard, but I still want something more.  I don't know, maybe my expectations are unrealistically high, but when you call yourself a Monkey Bar and have that playful critter on the cover of your box you'd think that maybe you could have a little bit more fun with your flavors.

Summary: You have to try this tea!
Text: The best experience for this tea is at the actual Pike Place Market where they brew it so you can sample it in their charming little store past the flying fish and florist.  It is also really great to have any other time in your life and to share with everyone you meet.  Since every grocery store doesn't stock this wonderful tea you will have to order it and stock your kitchen/office/cabin/whatever with it and enjoy.

This tea has the most fragrant, soothing flavor...when it is fresh. But BEWARE, as the label warns, it has a short shelf life and must be stored in a glass jar in the freezer or refrigerator.
Make the mistake of not heeding this warning and your tea will spoil very quickly.

My husband and I were vacationing in Alaska, and on one of our tours, our tour guide took us to a nursery where different types of Alaskan plants and flowers were growing.  The couple who owned the nursery had snacks and hot tea for all of us.  We tried the hot tea (MarketSpice Tea), and it was absolutely wonderful!  This tea is from Seattle, Washington, and is very popular there.  We are from Syracuse, NY, and have not found any tea like this here. This tea doesn't have any preservatives, and has an absolutely amazing cinnamon flavor!  You can get this tea either regular or decaf.  We are hooked!  We are so happy that we can get it through Amazon.com.
We use to live in Washington State and my daughter loves this tea.  We have lived several places because of my husband being in the military and we have not found anything that tastes as good.

We had this tea while on vacation in Seattle and were instantly hooked! It is our family's favorite iced tea and numerous friends have since asked me for ordering info to purchase it too.
We have ordered both loose and teabags (also in decaf) ---it is all excellent. So thankful we can order off Amazon!

The tea is excellent.  The flavor is strong unlike some decaf products that seem weak and lack almost any flavor. Was happy to find it here last time I searched and searched before I had a friend pick it up in Seattle for me.

Summary: Yummy tea, some bags more potent than others
Text: I love this tea.  Its flavor is usually super potent (cinnamon and orange), although some of the 50 tea bags (which I store in a glass jar in my freezer) are more potent than others.  I'll be buying more fairly soon.  Yum.  I wish it qualified for Free super saver shipping, though!

I'd had Market Spice Tea at a friends home and when I found I could obtain it in the DeCaf I was sold for sure! I love having a cup in the evening, watching TV before bed time!
It is delicious! You have to love oranges and spices and I store mine in glass jars that seal (they must be GLASS) in my freezer taking one out at a time. I can not tell any difference in taste between the regular and the DeCaf!
This tea I originally found at my hair dressers! I had to have it, Amazon had it, quick shipped, and I enjoy it every day!

This tea was first shared with me by my sister-in-law when I visited Seattle many years ago.  She would bring it back to Ohio for us, until I found out that I could order it myself!  A treat now has become a staple in my home!  Try it!  You just might like it!  Cheryl.

ProfileName: Sarah B. Bergstrom "new to the kitchen"
Text: So far I've only had this one kind of Market Spice tea but it is amazing!  It is such a strong, aromatic tea.  Be sure you store it properly (per the instructions included with it) or the flavors won't be anywhere near as strong and flavorful!

For the third time, reviewing, yes, I will order this item as long as they have it. Warning: Habit forming, but worth it!!! I put the teabags in my thermos with a little sugar and perhaps another teabag of green tea and carry with me wherever I travel. Good picker upper.
I love Market Spice tea. The decaf is just as good as the regular.  Great service handling my order.  Will definitely order again.

This was the tea I would always choose when I was at a popular Seattle spa. A friend that I went with told me that I could get my own and didn't have to go to the spa every time  I wanted some... I got some for Christmas and found out that 24 is just not enough! This tea is wonderful and takes me back to the spa every cup!
The flavor of this tea is fantastic!  I received some as a gift from Seattle directly and had to find out how to get some more.  Thanks to Amazon for carrying this product.

Seattle Marketspice tea has been my favorite since I was a student at University of Washington in 1968.  It is spicy/sweeet with no sugar.  Great hot or iced.  I was so happy to find that I can order in on Amazon!

I have odered this Tea over the internet for years but this is this the first time from this provider. The service was a 5 also.

Thank you

Diane

As somebody who was raised in Cuba, practically on rock candy, I love it !!
Rock candy is very hard to find anywhere anymore, and when you do, the boxes go for about $1.50 apiece. It is great to find a supplier for about half that price.
Helped when I had a cold and soar throat and could not make it to the doctor-- I would purchase again
Excellent Peppermint tea - can't beat the price - would pay quite a bit more on store shelves...highly recommend the chamomile also

very wonder very light melow taste tea. not over powerful. great sit down read take knote type of tea. i tryed out see how good was.
well worth money spend.

The first box I ever bought was good. The tea, to me, tasted better cold than hot so I would make an ice tea of it and refrigerate it until I wanted it. The last few boxes I bought, however, were awful. I would boil the water and steep it and the tea would make this oily film over the top. It would just float and wasn't tasty to drink. I know sometimes plants have oils in them but this was excessive and killed the flavor. Not buying this brand again.
I was surprised to see that this product actually works, but they don't warn you about the god-awful smell. It's horrid, truly.

Mild taste. Just add some honey and it's just like any other mild tea you would buy. Supposed to be great for allergies and Stomach bloat after drinking/eating poorly, noticed it does calm my stomach down and aid in flattening the post drinking bloat. Worth it! Try to drink a cup before bed each night! Caffeine free!
Its a really delicious earthy, herbal tea. Every cup makes me feel warm and comfy. I love it! his will definitely be a repeat order.
